meanings.definition: A person with exceptional abilities or powers beyond those of ordinary humans.
meanings.sent1: Superhumans like superheroes can fly and lift heavy objects effortlessly.
meanings.sent2: The team of superhumans worked together to save the city from disaster.
meanings.sent3: The superhumans at the talent show amazed the audience with their incredible talents.
meanings.sent4: In the world of sports, these athletes are like superhumans, achieving feats beyond imagination.
meanings.sent5: The superhumans in the comic book have unique powers that set them apart from regular people.

meanings.definition: A group of individuals with extraordinary physical or mental capabilities.
meanings.sent1: The superhumans in the science fiction movie had advanced technology and skills.
meanings.sent2: The organization was formed by a team of superhumans to combat global threats.
meanings.sent3: During the competition, the superhumans displayed their incredible strength and intelligence.
meanings.sent4: The superhumans in the story were like a force of nature, unstoppable and awe-inspiring.
meanings.sent5: Legends speak of ancient superhumans who possessed powers beyond human comprehension.
